name: hash-link-scroll-offset
title: Hash Link Scroll Offset
description: Offset the scroll position of anchored links. Handy if you have a sticky header that covers linked material.

scripts.uglify: uglifyjs src/hash-link-scroll-offset.js -b -o assets/js/hash-link-scroll-offset.js && uglifyjs assets/js/hash-link-scroll-offset.js -m -c --source-map -o assets/js/hash-link-scroll-offset.min.js
